st: Saaye Ne Saath Chhod Diya Yaar Ne Dil Tod Diya,
s:
Saaye Ne Saath Chhod Diya Yaar Ne Dil Tod Diya,
Ab Toh Khuda Bhi Mere Khilaf Ho Gaya,
Jo Pyar Ka Chirag Jalaya Tha Maine,
Usi Chiraag Se Jalkar Main Khak Ho Gaya…

st: Kya Khoob Zamaane Ki Wafa Dekhte Rahe
s:
Kya Khoob Zamaane Ki Wafa Dekhte Rahe
Har Baat Me Hum Apni Khata Dekhte Rahe

Yu To Zamaane Ne Badle Bahut Rang
Par Hum To Uski Zafa Dekhte Rahe

Mushkilo Me Thi Zindagi Hamari
Hum To Bas Halaato Ka Maza Dekhte Rahe

Apne Kehne Ko To Bahut Mile
Par Hum Uska Ehsas Dekhte Rahe

Yu To Chahat Ka Samundar Tha Hamare Paas
Hum To Kisi Ke Milne Ki Aans Dekhte Rahe…

st: Mana Ke Pyar Kisi Ka Mere Paas Nahi,
s:
Mana Ke Pyar Kisi Ka Mere Paas Nahi,
Magar Tunhein Meri Mohabbat Ka Ehsaas Nahi,

Jaane Pee Gaye Hum Kitne Gham E Aansu,
Ab Kuchh Aur Peene Ki Pyaas Nahi…

st: Pasand Karta Hun Har Haseeno Ko,
s:
Pasand Karta Hun Har Haseeno Ko,
Magar Dil Mein Basane Ke Liye Jagah Nahi,

Thukra Dete Hain Begane Samajhkar,
Uski Hoti Koi Thukraane Ki Vajah Nahi…

st: Umeedon Ke Daman Mein Zinda Hain Hum,
s:
Umeedon Ke Daman Mein Zinda Hain Hum,
Warna Jeene Ki Chahat Kahan ?
Tumse Milne Ki Aarzoo Liye Firte Hain Dar-B-Dar,
Warna Is Laash Ke Naseeb Mein Kabr Kahan ?

st: Kabhi Mohabbat Karo Toh Hum Se Karna,
s:
Kabhi Mohabbat Karo Toh Hum Se Karna,
Dil Ki Baat Juba Par Aaye Toh Hum Se Kahna,

Na Kah Sako Toh Aankhein Jhuka Lena,
Hum Samajh Jaayenge Hamein Kuchh Na Kahna…

st: Churakar Dil Toh Mera Woh Bekhabar Se Baithe Hain,
s:
Churakar Dil Toh Mera Woh Bekhabar Se Baithe Hain,
Milate Nahi Najar Nahi Humse Woh Chat Par Aan Baithe Hain,

Dekh Kar Humko Kitab Se Mooh Chhipakar Baithe Hain,
Unhein Khud Nahi Maalum Ki Woh Kya Kar Baithe Hain…

st: Woh Begaano Mein Apne,
s:
Woh Begaano Mein Apne,
Hum Apno Mein Anjaan Lagte Hain,

Hamare Khoon Ki Keemat Nahi,
Unke Ashkon Ke Bhi Daam Lagte Hain,

Kya Bheekh Mange,
Upar Waale Se Ab Jeevan Ki,

Ab Toh Yeh Lamhe,
Chand Dino Ke Mehmaan Lagte Hain….

st: Mere Dil Mein Na Aao Varna Doob Jaaoge,
s:
Mere Dil Mein Na Aao Varna Doob Jaaoge,
Gham E Ashkon Ke Shiwa Kuchh Bhi Nahi Andar,

Agar Ek Bar Risne Laga Jo Paani,
Toh Kam Pad Jaayega Bharne Ke Liye Samander…

st: Mera Sahara Toh Sharab Ka Pyala Hai,
s:
Mera Sahara Toh Sharab Ka Pyala Hai,
Jakhmon Ne Mujhe Dard Dekar Pala Hai,

Thokar Marker Giraya Khusi Ne Mujhe,
Toh Haath Badhakar Ghamon Ne Sambhala Hai…

st: Har Khusi Ke Pahlu Haaton Se Chhut Gaye,
s:
Har Khusi Ke Pahlu Haaton Se Chhut Gaye,
Ab Toh Khud Ke Saaye Bhi Rooth Gaye,

Haalat Hain Aise Zindagi Mein Hamari,
Pyar Ki Rahon Mein Hum Bilkul Toot Gaye…

st: Bebas Hai Dil Beraham Hain Niganein,
s:
Bebas Hai Dil Beraham Hain Niganein,
Marne Se Pahle Thaam Lena Meri Baahein,

Fir Maalum Nahi Manzil Mile Na Mile,
Sambhal Kar Chalna Kanton Bhari Hain Raahein…

st: Aise Na Muskaraao Aise Na Tadpaao,
s:
Aise Na Muskaraao Aise Na Tadpaao,
Meri Halat Par Sanam, Kuchh Toh Raham Khaao,

Jale Hain Hum Ek Chirag Ki Tarah,
Apni Judai Se Hamein Ab Aur Na Tadpaao…..

st: Kore Kagaj Ki Tarah,
s:
Kore Kagaj Ki Tarah,
Meri Zindagi Veeran Hai,

Gham Ki Duniya Mein Yaaro,
Gham Hi Meri Pahchan Hai,

Khud Gham Sada Hoke Bhi,
Karta Hai, Khush Logon Ko,

Sach Toh Yeh Hai Sanam,
Ki Dard Hi Jaan Hai….

st: Humne Tere Pyar Ki Khatir, Duniya Ko Thukraya Tha,
s:
Humne Tere Pyar Ki Khatir, Duniya Ko Thukraya Tha,
Saare Jag Ko Chhod Ke Humne Tumko Meet Banaya Tha,

Fir Bhio Sangdil Chhod Ke Tanha, Tune Apne Khan Ko,
Gair Ki Sej Sajayi Tune, Gair Ka Saath Nibhaya Tha,

Tujh Se Hai Na Shikwa, Na Gila Hai Rakibon Se,
Duniya Mein Milta Hai Pyar Toh Naseebon Se,

Duniya Mein Milta Hai Pyar Toh Naseebon Se…

Tera Who Pyar Mujhe, Raaton Ko Jagayega,
Tone Mujhe Thukraya Toh, Chain Nahi Aayega,

Hoga Na Ilaaj Mera, Kabhi Bhi Tabijon Se,
Duniya Mein Milta Hai Pyar Toh Naseebon Se-2…..

st: Teri Yaadon Ne Bakhse The,
s:
Teri Yaadon Ne Bakhse The,
Jo Aansu Meri Aankhon Ko,

Mohabbat Se Unhein,
Hai Maine Palkon Pe Saja Rakha,

Jara Socho, Mera Kaatil,
Tumhe Har Sakhas Kahta Hai,

Hai Apna Jurm Peshani Pe,
Kyu Toone Laga Rakha,

Mere Liye Jeena Yeh Saja Ho Gaya,
Yaar Mera Mujhse Juda Ho Gaya….

st: Haay Seene Se Lagaunga,
s:
Haay Seene Se Lagaunga,
Bhool Ke Tujhe Main Mar Jaaunga,

Haai Main Mar Jaaunga,
Kiya Sadik Ka Tune Bura Haal -2,

Laga Ke Mehndi Mere Khoon Ki,
Haay Laga Ke Mehndi Mere Khoon Ki,

Gore Haath Tune Kar Liye Laal,
Laga Ke Mehndi Mere Khoon Ki,

Mere Ashkon Ka Na Mana Sawaal,
Laga Ke Mehndi Mere Khoon Ki…

st: Bahut Ho Chuka Intezaar Unka,
s:
Bahut Ho Chuka Intezaar Unka,
Ab Aur Zakham Sahe Jaate Nahi,

Kya Bayaan Karein Unke Sitam Ko,
Dard Unke Kahe Jate Nahi…

st: Apne Pyar Mein Woh Hamein Badnaam Samjhate Hain,
s:
Apne Pyar Mein Woh Hamein Badnaam Samjhate Hain,
Unpar Hum Fida Huve Toh Apna Gulaam Samjhate Hain,

Man Ke Pujaari Ki Unko Kuchh Bhi Kadar Nahi,
Tan Ke Pujaari Ko Woh Apna Bhagwan Samjhate…

st: Gilas Par Gilas Tutate Rahe ,
s:
Gilas Par Gilas Tutate Rahe ,
Ghamon Ne Khusi Ka Pyala Bharne Na Diya,

Masalon Ki Tarah Dil Jalte Rahe,
Badkismati Ne Ujala Karne Na Diya…

st: Bhale Hi Raah Chalton Ka Daaman Tham Le,
s:
Bhale Hi Raah Chalton Ka Daaman Tham Le,
Magar Mere Pyar Ko Bhi Tu Pahchan Le,

Kitna Intezaar Kiya Hai Tere Ishq Mein,
Jara Yeh Dill Ki Betaabi Tu Jaan Le..

st: Dil Ki Zalan Mitane Ke Liye,
s:
Dil Ki Zalan Mitane Ke Liye,
Tere Sitam Bhulane Ke Liye,

Peete Hain Sharab Teri Yaad Mein Hum,
Warna Lakhon Hain Ghar Basaane Ke Liye….

st: Mere Armano Ko Yun Kuchalo Na Tum,
s:
Mere Armano Ko Yun Kuchalo Na Tum,
Ki Zindagi Adhuri Rah Jaaye Meri,

Dikha De Khuda Is Kadar Karisma,
Ki Har Tamanna Poori Ho Jaaye Meri….

st: Phir Se Woh Sapna Sajane Chala Hun,
s:
Phir Se Woh Sapna Sajane Chala Hun,
Umeedon Ke Sahare Dil Lagane Chala Hun,

Anzaam To Mera Bura Hi Hoga,
Phir Bhi Tumhe Apna Banane Chala Hun…

st: Tanhai Mein Hum Teri Taakte Hain Raahein,
s:
Tanhai Mein Hum Teri Taakte Hain Raahein,
Tumhe Dekhne Ko Tarsati Hain Nigahein,

Bekhudi Ka Yeh Aalam Hai Kaisa,
Tumhe Yaad Karke Nikalti Hain Aahein…

st: Hamein Chhodkar Akela Kyun Ja Rahe Ho,
s:
Hamein Chhodkar Akela Kyun Ja Rahe Ho,
Kya Baat Hai Aakhir Jo Ghabra Rahe Ho,
Do Hi Baatein Ho Sakti Hain Sanam,
Yakin Nahi Humpar Ya Sharma Rahe Ho…

st: Zinda Hun Jab Tak Tu Aabad Rahegi,
s:
Zinda Hun Jab Tak Tu Aabad Rahegi,
Pyar Ki Woh Chand Mulakaten Hamesha Yaad Rahengi,

Udhar Tum Rahna Sanam Khushaal Hamesha,
Aur Idhar Zindagi Meri Barbaad Rahegi….

st: Har Lamha Apni Palkon Par Bithaya Tujhe,
s:
Har Lamha Apni Palkon Par Bithaya Tujhe,
Phir Bhi Yeh Ishq Mera Na Raas Aaya Tujhe,

Kismat Ki Bhi Hai Yeh Ajib Dastan,
Kabhi Hasaya To Kabhi Rulaya Mujhe….

st: Kitne Armaano Ko Dafnaye Baitha Hun,
s:
Kitne Armaano Ko Dafnaye Baitha Hun,
Kitne Zakhmo Ko Dabaye Baitha Hun,

Milna Muskil Hai Unse Is Daur Mein,
Phir Bhi Deedar Ki Aas Lagaye Baitha Hun….

st: Tum Daga Karo Tab Bhi Gaddar Nahi,
s:
Tum Daga Karo Tab Bhi Gaddar Nahi,
Hum Wafa Karein To Bhi Gunahgar Hain,

Khata Teri Nahi O Sanam Mere,
Yeh To Waqt Waqt Ki Maar Hai….

st: Ek Tum Hi Se Umeed Ki Hai Mere Khuda,
s:
Ek Tum Hi Se Umeed Ki Hai Mere Khuda,
Der Na Kar Jara Unse Zaldi Mila,

Yeh Rokar Karte Hain Gujaris Upar Wale,
Kahin Ho Na Jaaye Meri Yeh Zindagi Tabaah….

st: Kitna Chaahata Hun Tujhe Yeh Mujhko Pata Nahi,
s:
Kitna Chaahata Hun Tujhe Yeh Mujhko Pata Nahi,
Magar Tumhare Siwa Koi Aur Dil Mein Basa Nahi,

Zamana Dusman Ho Gaya Chaahat Ka Hamari,
Juda Ho Gaye Phir Se Ham Yeh Meri Khata Nahi….

st: Laakh Bandisen Laga Le Duniya Hum Par,
s:
Laakh Bandisen Laga Le Duniya Hum Par,
Magar Dil Par Kaabu Nahi Kar Payenge,

Woh Lamha Aakhiri Hoga Zeevan Ka Hamara,
Jis Din Hum Yaar Tujhe Bhul Jayenge….

st: Koi Toh Inteha Hogi Mere Pyar Ki Khuda,
s:
Koi Toh Inteha Hogi Mere Pyar Ki Khuda,
Kab Tak Dega Tu Is Kadar Hamein Saja,

Nikal Le Tu Is Jism Se Jaan Meri,
Yah Mila De Mujhko Meri Dilruba…

st: Mere Zakhamo Ko Hawa De Rahe Ho,
s:
Mere Zakhamo Ko Hawa De Rahe Ho,
Kis Baat Ki Yeh Saja De Rahe Ho,

Hamne Toh Yaar Koi Gustaakhi Nahi Ki,
Phir Kyon Marne Ki Baddua De Rahi Ho….

st: Na Toh Dua Hi Kaam Aayi Mere,
s:
Na Toh Dua Hi Kaam Aayi Mere,
Na Hi Dawaon Ne Asar Kiya,

Har Zakham Naasur Hota Raha Mera,
Yeh Zeevan Ro-Rokar Basar Kiya….

st: Hum Jaante Nahi Kya Hua Hai,
s:
Hum Jaante Nahi Kya Hua Hai,
Aap Khush Rahein Bas Yeh Hi Dua Hai,

Chahat Pal Do Pal Ki Khushi Thi,
Aaj Yeh Saja Hai Saja Hai Saja Hai…..

st: Tere Hote Huye Bhi Tanhai Mili Hai,
s:
Tere Hote Huye Bhi Tanhai Mili Hai,
Wafa Karke Bhi Dekho Buraayi Mili Hai,

Jitni Dua Ki Tumhe Paane Ki,
Us Se Jyada Teri Judai Mili Hai….

st: Ab Tak Taaza Hai Zakham Seene Mein,
s:
Ab Tak Taaza Hai Zakham Seene Mein,
Bin Tere Kya Rakha Hai Jeene Mein,
Hamein Toh Sanam Tera Sahara Chahiye,
Warna Der Nahi Hai Zahar Peene Mein…

st: Kismat Mein Hamari Likhi Hai Barbaadiyan,
s:
Kismat Mein Hamari Likhi Hai Barbaadiyan,
Kab Tak Karayega Khuda Hasino Ki Shadiyan,

Raas Aa Gayi Hai Wirani Mahphil Mujhe,
Ab Dasne Lagi Hai Yeh Hasee Waadiyan…

st: Kabhi Teri Baahon Mein Har Gham Bhula Diya Karte The Hum,
s:
Kabhi Teri Baahon Mein Har Gham Bhula Diya Karte The Hum,
Magar Aaj Yeh Baahein Gairon Ke Naam Ho Gayi,

Kya Dein Hum Yaar Tujhe Duayen,
Ab To Dua Ke Liya Bhi Tu Naakam Ho Gayi…..

st: Tarsegi Tu Pyar Ke Liye Tamam Umar,
s:
Tarsegi Tu Pyar Ke Liye Tamam Umar,
Ab Yaar Tujhe Main Aisi Saja Dunga,

Yaad Karegi Jab Tu Mere Pyar Ko,
Magar Us Din Main Tujhe Bhula Dunga….

st: Hamane Bhi Dekhe Hain Barbadi Ke Daur,
s:
Hamane Bhi Dekhe Hain Barbadi Ke Daur,
Zindagi Kaanto Par Basar Ki Hai,

Yeh Main Nahi Kahta Yaar Mere,
Yeh To Dastan Jigar Ki Hai….

st: Ishq Paane Ki Tamanna Mein Sanam,
s:
Ishq Paane Ki Tamanna Mein Sanam,
Zindagi Barbad Banker Reh Gayi,

Jis Surat Ko Dil Mein Basaya Tha Kabhi,
Aaj Woh Surat Ek Yaad Bankar Rah Gayi….

st: Woh  Pal Aakhri Hoga Meri Zindagi Ka,
s:
Woh  Pal Aakhri Hoga Meri Zindagi Ka,
Jis Din Tu Mujhse Juda Hoga,
Karar Tujhe Bhi Na Aane Dunga Main,
Agar Is Daur Mein Tu Bewafa Hoga….

st: Aaj Usne Apni Alag Duniya Basai Hai,
s:
Aaj Usne Apni Alag Duniya Basai Hai,
Meri Zindagi Bhi Maut Se Jitati Aayi Hai,

Jitni Todna Chahata Hun Zindagi Ki Taar Main,
Utna Hi Khuda Ne Meri Umar Badhai Hai….

st: Kismat Ne Bar-Bar Bachaya Hun Main,
s:
Kismat Ne Bar-Bar Bachaya Hun Main,
Maut Ke Muh Se Bhi Wapas Laut Aaya Hun Main,

Kyun Kari, Ham Par Itani Rahmat Khuda,
Pahle Hi Unke Rahmat Ka Sataya Hun Mein….

st: Paimane Se Nikli Hai Aawaz Teri,
s:
Paimane Se Nikli Hai Aawaz Teri,
Stati Hai Mujhko Sanam Yaad Teri,

Kisi Gair Ka Daman Tham Na Lena,
Warna Ho Jayegi zindagi Barbad Meri…

st: Dil Karta Hai Aag Laga Doon Is Zamaane Ko,
s:
Dil Karta Hai Aag Laga Doon Is Zamaane Ko,
Jisne Dard Hi Dard Diya Har Diwaane Ko,

Har Pal Zakham Khaya Hai Dil Ne Mere,
Ab Kya Rah Gaya Aur Aajmaane Ko….

st: Yaad Mein Teri Kaise Din Gujaare Hain,
s:
Yaad Mein Teri Kaise Din Gujaare Hain,
Puchho Na Hamse Aalam Woh Judai Ka,

Kaanto Ki Tarah Chubhta Raha Woh Lamha,
Ro-Rokar Gujara Hai Raasta Har Tanhai Ka….

st: Kya-Kya Na Saha Tere Pyar Ke Liye,
s:
Kya-Kya Na Saha Tere Pyar Ke Liye,
Tu Bhul Gayee Mujhe Begaane Yaar Ke Liye,

Bitaaye The Lamhe Saath Milkar Kabhi,
Tarsate Hain Aaj Tere Deedar Ke Liye….

st: Jaane Meri Aankhon Se Kitne Aansu Bah Gaye,
s:
Jaane Meri Aankhon Se Kitne Aansu Bah Gaye,
Insaano Ki Bheed Mein Bhi Dekho Tanha Rah Gaye,

Karte The Jo Kabhi Apni Wafa Ki Baatein,
Aaj Wohi Sanam Mujhe Bewafa Kah Gaye….

st: Maine Bhi Dil Ka Dard Bayan Kiya Hai,
s:
Maine Bhi Dil Ka Dard Bayan Kiya Hai,
Khusi Ka Har Lamha Tere Naam Kiya Hai,

Dekho Jara Yeh Mera Bigda Hua Mukaddar,
Kismat Ne Har Jagah Naakam Kiya Hai….

st: Baar Baar Dil Par Jakham Kab Tak Sahun Main,
s:
Baar Baar Dil Par Jakham Kab Tak Sahun Main,
Sah Sahkar Yeh Sitam Kab Tak Chup Rahu Main,

Jaante Hain Zamane Waale Mere Halat Sabhi,
Chahiye Jakhmon Ki Dawa Yeh Kis Se Kahun Main….

st: Nibhaoge Tum Kasmein Yeh Wada Na Karo,
s:
Nibhaoge Tum Kasmein Yeh Wada Na Karo,
Mohabbat Humse Itni Jyada Na Karo,

Dekhe Hain Maine Bhi Daur Tabahi Ke,
Aur Hamein Sataane Ka Irada Na Karo…

st: Kis Tarah Byan Karun Seene Mein Unke Raaz Hain,
s:
Kis Tarah Byan Karun Seene Mein Unke Raaz Hain,
Muskurakar Jalaate Hain Woh Kitna Ghatiya Yeh Andaaz Hai,
Kyun Pasand Kiya Maine Us Bedardi Bewafa Ko,
Yeh Hi Soch Sochkar Zindagi Udaas Meri Aaj Hai….

st: Woh Chahte Hain Hum Aabad Rahein,
s:
Woh Chahte Hain Hum Aabad Rahein,
Barbaadi Mein Bhi Kasar Nahi,

Har Dard Hans Ke Saha,
Phir Bhi Un Par Hua Asar Nahi….

st: Aaj Jhi Bharkar Hum Par Hans Lo Beraham,
s:
Aaj Jhi Bharkar Hum Par Hans Lo Beraham,
Fir Tujhe Milne Waale Hain Mere Gham Sabhi,

Teri Bewafayi Ka Charcha Charon Dishaon Main Hai,
Mujhe Diye Jakhmon Ka Hisaab Chukana Hai Kabhi Na Kabhi…

st: Dastan Soon Lo Jara Ghame Zindgi,
s:
Dastan Soon Lo Jara Ghame Zindgi,
Bewafa Samajh Baithe Tumhe Dilagi,

Gairon Ki Baahon Main Machlati Ho Tum,
Behad Mehesoos Hoti Hai Hame Shermindagi…

st: Zindgi Ham Tujhe Thokar Maar Dete,
s:
Zindgi Ham Tujhe Thokar Maar Dete,
Agar Main Akela Hi Tera Hakdar Hota,

Ham Khushi Ko Gale Laga Lete,
Agar Nai Hume Ghamon Se Pyar Hota…

st: Har Roz Mujhe Yeh Khayal Aata Hai,
s:
Har Roz Mujhe Yeh Khayal Aata Hai,
Ghamon Se Mera Bahut Purana Nata Hai,

Har Roz Teenka-Teenka Marte Hain Hum,
Chahkar Bhi Tera Chehra Nahi Bhulaya Jata Hai…..

st: Bedaag Or Begunah Meri Sarkar Hain,
s:
Bedaag Or Begunah Meri Sarkar Hain,
Humse unki Bewafai Se Waqt Ki Maar Hain,

Woh Bhale Hain Kitne Sitam Karein Hum Par,
Phir Bhi Mere Liye Wo Jaane Bahar Hain….

st: Teri Saja Tab Tak Qabool Hai Mujhe,
s:
Teri Saja Tab Tak Qabool Hai Mujhe,
Jab Tak Mere Sareer Mein Jaan Hai,

Kaise Dushmano Se Gila Karein Hum,
Jab Apne Hi Un Par Meharban Hain….

st: Aapke Pyar Mein Payi Hain Ehsi Sajayein,
s:
Aapke Pyar Mein Payi Hain Ehsi Sajayein,
Ke Khud Ke Saath Mein Ho Gaye Hum Paraye,

Aapne Toh Apne Halaat Bataa Diye Mujhe,
Magar Hum Kiske Saamne Yahan Aansu Bahayein….

st: Har Aag Bujh Jati Hai Barsat Mein,
s:
Har Aag Bujh Jati Hai Barsat Mein,
Magar Dil Ki Aag Na Bujh Saki,

Aansu Ka Paani Girta Raha,
Phir Bhi Dekho Yahan Jalti Rahi…..

st: Mana Hum Aapke Kaabil Nahi,
s:
Mana Hum Aapke Kaabil Nahi,
Samne Hokar Bhi Nazar Aati Manzil Nahi,

Ghame Apne Pyar Mein Tadapne Se,
Hoga Sanam Kuchh Bhi Hashil Nahi….

st: Baadal Barasne Ka Mausam Hota Hai,
s:
Baadal Barasne Ka Mausam Hota Hai,
Aankhe Barasne Ka Mausam Koi Nahi,

Hum Tere Pyar Mein Gham E Zaher Peete Rahe,
Phir Bhi Ek Boond Aansu Tu Royi Nahi……

st: Aankhein Roi Padhi Hani, Na Unka Paigam Aaya
s:
Aankhein Roi Padhi Hani, Na Unka Paigam Aaya
Chale Gaye Humein Akela Chodkar, Yeh Kaisa Mukaam Aaya

Meri Tanhai Mujhpar Hansi Yeh Keh Kar, Aur Boli
Bataa Aakhir Mera Siva Tere Kaun Kaam Aaya…

st: Sukhi Tehni Tanha Chidiya Feeka Chand
s:
Sukhi Tehni Tanha Chidiya Feeka Chand
Aakhon Ka Sehra Mein Ek Nami Ka Chand

Us Maathe Ko Chume Kitne Din Beete
Jis Maathe Ki Khatir Tha Ik Teeka Chanda

Pehle Tu Lagti Thi Kitni Begana
Kitna Dhundhla Hota Hai Pehli Ka Chand

Kam Ho Kaise In Khushiyon Se Tera Gham
Lehron Mein Kab Behta Hai Nadi Ka Chand

Aao Ab Hum Iske Bhi Tukde Kar Lein
Dhaka, Rawalpindi Aur Dilli Ka Chand…

st: Aapke paas waqt nahi hame yaad karne ka,
s:
Aapke paas waqt nahi hame yaad karne ka,
bewaqt hi yaad kar liya karo,
Mana aap ke paas sari duniya hai,
kabhi hamara bhi ahsas kar liya karo…

st: Ae hawa tu udhar to jati hogi,
s:
Ae hawa tu udhar to jati hogi,
Unko hmara hal to batati hogi,
zara chhu kar to dekh unke dil ko,
kya yaad unko bhi hamari aati hogi…

st: Shaan Se Pyar Ka Izhar Karenge,
s:
Shaan Se Pyar Ka Izhar Karenge,
Teri Mohabbat Pe Jaan Bhi Nisar Karenge,

Dekh K Jalegi Duniya Saari,
Is Kadar Tujhpe Aitbaar Karenge,

Denge Salaami Sab Humko,
Jab Pyar Ko Hum Bayaan Karenge,

Daulat Aur Shaurat Ka Kya Hai Kaam,
Teri Khushi Mein Khudko Nichaawar Karenge,

Har Ghadi Ho Bus Tera Deedar,
Waqt Se Hum Yahi Iltijaa Karenge,

Saaye Ki Tarah Tujhse Liptey Rahenge,
Duniya Ki Buri Nazar Se Tujhe Bachaya Karenge…

st: Dard Ki Har Ek Hadd Se Ab Guzar Gaya Hon Main,
s:
Dard Ki Har Ek Hadd Se Ab Guzar Gaya Hon Main,
Phir Kabhi Na Simtunga Youn Bikhar Gaya Hon Main,

Mout Bas Naheen Aati Rooh Ke Nikalne Se,
Sans Mujh Main Baqi Hai Phir Bhi Mer Gaya Hon Main,

Zindagi Main Jitni Bhi Roshni Thi Uss Se Thi,
Mustaqil Andhero Main Ab Utar Gaya Hon Main,

Baam O Darr Bhi Us Ke Baad Ho Gaye Hain You Khamosh,
Aur Dil Ulajhta Hai Jabb Bhi Ghar Gaya Hon Main,

Us Ka Sath Jab Tak Tha Rung Rung Mausam The,
Bas Khizaan Ke Mausam Main Ab Thhehar Gaya Hon Main…

st: Jaate Jaate Vo Mujhe Achchhii Nishaani De Gaya,
s:
Jaate Jaate Vo Mujhe Achchhii Nishaani De Gaya,
Umr Bhar Doharaauunga Aisii Kahani De Gayaa,

Us Se Main Kuchh Paa Sakuun Aisii Kahaan Ummeed Thi,
Gam Bhi Vo Shaayad Bara-E-Meharabanii De Gaya,

Sab Havayen Le Gayaa Mere Samandar Kii Koi,
Aur Mujh Ko Ek Karatii Badabanii De Gaya,

Khair Main Pyaasa Rahaa Par Us Ne Itana To Kiya,
Meri Palakon Ki Kataron Ko Vo Paanii De Gaya…

st: Tumse Mila Aur Milkar Laga Ki Milna Hi Bas Apna Tha,
s:
Tumse Mila Aur Milkar Laga Ki Milna Hi Bas Apna Tha,
Duriyan Badhi Fasle Badhe Aur Laga Ki Fasle Hi Manzile Thi,

Chhitiz Ko Dekh Aakash Ko Laga Ki Na Mil Pana Ki Uska Mukam Hai,
Subah Ki Krno Ke Dekh Nisha Ko Laga Ki Bhor Hi Uska Anjaam Hai,

Anjamen Gulishtan To Dekho Ki Phoolon Se Khushboo Chali Gayee,
Badnaam Shaam To Dekho Ki Saaz Se Awaz Chali Gayee,

Jana Hi Uski Fidrat Thi Par Aisa Laga Ki,
Jaate Jaate Meri Sansar Chali Gayee…..

st: Koi Baat Dil Se Yun Naa Lagaya Karo,
s:
Koi Baat Dil Se Yun Naa Lagaya Karo,
Badle Halaat To Aise Naa Ghabraya Karo,
Har Taraf Dhundhe Hai Nazar Aayega Kaise,
Mausm Ke Mijaz Ko Zara Samajh Jaya Karo,
Sadak Se Lambi Zindagi Hai Chalte Rahoge,
Aaye Kahin Darakht To Shaam Biithaya Karo,
Mumkiin Hai Yaadon Ke Ghar Bana Bhi Lo,
Tuutne Pe Unke Aansoon Naa Bahaya Karo,
Deke Intezaar Ke Lamhe Jana Acha Nahi,
Tum Waqt Pe Ghar Aaya Karo…

st: Kis Taraf Le Chaloge Mujhe,
s:
Kis Taraf Le Chaloge Mujhe,
Raaste Mein Jab Miloge,
Lafz Lafz Saaf Ho Jaaungaa,
Kitaab Saa Jab Padhoge Mujhe,
Nazdik Itnaa Hoon Tumhare,
Yaad Kar Ke Kyaa Karoge Mujhe,
Koi Be-Noor Tasviir Nahi Hoon,
Jo Apne Rang Se Bharoge Mujhe,
Aansoo Tab Tak Nahi Rukenge,
Jazbaat Se Khaali Nahi Karoge Mujhe,
Agar Ek Baar Rooth Gayaa,
Kaha-Kaha Dhoondte Phiroge Mujhe…

st: Kitne Sapne Dil Mein Sajaye Tere Liye,
s:
Kitne Sapne Dil Mein Sajaye Tere Liye,
Raahon Mein Phool Bichhaye Tere Liye,
Aati Hai Koi Yaad Teri Chupke Se,
Har Dastak Pe Bahar Aaye Tere Liye,
Jhooti Lagti Hai Har Kahaani Duniya Ki,
Mohabbat Sacchi Nazar Aaye Tere Liye,
Likhe Rakhe Hai Jo Khat Haath Ke,
Harf-Dar-Harf Dard Badhaye Tere Liye…
Intezar Ki Ab To Intahaa Ho Gai Hai,
Kitna Aankhon Ko Ruulaye Tere Liye,
Mitti Ka Khilona Ban Gaya Hai,
Bas Tuut Ke Judhna Aa Jaye Tere Liye…

st: Dil Ki Baat Dil Mein Rahii Ho Jaise,
s:
Dil Ki Baat Dil Mein Rahii Ho Jaise,
Hans Ke Tuu Naa Hansi Ho Jaise,
Umar Se Lambi Sadak Pe Chalte,
Koi Sadaa Tuune Sunii Ho Jaise,
Armaan Jitne Sajaye The Kabhi,
Woh Aas Dil Mein Dabi Ho Jaise,
Dekhne Ko Tasveer Haath Mein,
Yaad Koi Puraani Li Ho Jaise,
Raat Ke Khaali Sannaate Mein,
Saans Ruk Ruk Ke Chali Ho Jaise,
Waqt Ke Band Darwaazon Mein,
Jaag Ke Der Tak Darri Ho Jaise,
Dipak Se Le Ke Koi Kiitaab,
Tuune Raat Bhar Padhi Ho Jaise…

st: Har Sapna Khushi Pane Se Pura Nahi Hota,
s:
Har Sapna Khushi Pane Se Pura Nahi Hota,
Koi Kisi Ke Bina Adhora Nahi Hota,
Jo Chand Roshan Karta Hai Rat Bhar Sab Ko,
Har Raat Woh Bhi To Poora Nahi Hota…

st: Bhahut Roya Tha Jab Mera Janam Hua Tha,
s:
Bhahut Roya Tha Jab Mera Janam Hua Tha,
Aur Hans Rahi Thi Ye Duniya,
Magar Doston Ek Din Badala Lunga,
Hansta Hua Jaunga Aur Royegi Ye Duniya…

st: Suraj Ko Diya Dikhane Se Kya Fayeda,
s:
Suraj Ko Diya Dikhane Se Kya Fayeda,
Laash Ko Aag Lagane Se Kya Fayeda,
Aye Shahjahaan Mumtaz To Jaa Chuki,
Ab Laash Pe Taj Banane Se Kya Fayeda…

st: Meri Zindagi Ghamon Se Ho Gayi Hai Taar,
s:
Meri Zindagi Ghamon Se Ho Gayi Hai Taar,
Khushiyan Bhi Mere Kareeb Nahi Aaati,
Zamane Bhar Ka Zeher Pee Liya Humne,
Jaan Hai Ki Kambhaqt Nikal Nahi Jaati…

st: Sagar Main Gehraayi Hoti Hai,
s:
Sagar Main Gehraayi Hoti Hai,
Yaadon Main Tanhayi Hoti Hai,
Is Busy Life Main Kaun Kisko Yaad Karta Hai,
Aur Agar Karta Hai To Uski Yaado Main Sachhayi Hoti Hai…

st: Kadmo Ki Duri Se Dilo Ke Fasle Nhi Badhte,
s:
Kadmo Ki Duri Se Dilo Ke Fasle Nhi Badhte,
Dur Hone Se Ehsas Nhi Marte,
Kuch Kadmo Ka Fasla Hi Sahi Hamare Beech,
Lekin Aisa Koi Pal Nhi Jab Hum Apko Yaad Nhi Krte..

st: Khushion Se Naraz Hai Meri Zindagi,
s:
Khushion Se Naraz Hai Meri Zindagi,
Pyar Ki Mohtaz Hai Meri Zindagi,
Has Leta Hoon Logon Ko Dikhane Ke Liye,
Varna Dard Ki Kitaab Hai Meri Zindagi…

st: Meri Zindagi Ghamon Se Ho Gayi Hai Taar
s:
Meri Zindagi Ghamon Se Ho Gayi Hai Taar
Khushiyan Bhi Mere Kareeb Nahi Aaati
Zamane Bhar Ka Zeher Pee Liya Humne
Jaan Hai Ki Kambhaqt Nikal Nahi Jaati…

st: Zindagi Bahut Kuch Sikhati Hai,
s:
Zindagi Bahut Kuch Sikhati Hai,
Kabhi Hasati Hai Kabhi Rulati Hai,
Khud Se Bhi Jyada Kisi Par Vishwash Mat Karna,
Kyuki Andhere Mein To Parchai Bhi Saath Chod Jati Hai…

st: Dil Ki Awaz Koi Pehchanta Nahi,
s:
Dil Ki Awaz Koi Pehchanta Nahi,
Kisko Kya Dard Hai Koi Janta Nahi,
Hum Bhi Nahi Chahte Aapko Pareshan Karna,
Magar Kya Kare Dil Hai Ki Manta Nahi…

st: Zindagi Se Sabhi Ko Mohabbat Hai,
s:
Zindagi Se Sabhi Ko Mohabbat Hai,
Par Zindagi Kisi Ki Mohabbat Nahi Banti,
Tamanna Le Kar Jeete Hai Sab Log,
Magar Har Tamanna Taqdeer Nahi Banti…

st: Zindagi Hasin Hai Zindagi Se Pyaar Karo,
s:
Zindagi Hasin Hai Zindagi Se Pyaar Karo,
Hai Rat To Subah Ka Intzar Karo,
Wo Pal Bhi Ayega Jiska Intzaar Hai Aap Ko,
Rab Pr Bhrosa Or Waqt Pe Aitbar Rakho…

st: Agar Zindagi Mein Judai Na Hoti,
s:
Agar Zindagi Mein Judai Na Hoti,
To Kabhi Kisi Ki Yad Aii Na Hoti,
Sath Hi Guzarta Har Lamha To,
Shayed Rishto Mein Ye Gehrai Na Hoti

st: Kaash Yeh Zalim Judaai Na Hoti,
s:
Kaash Yeh Zalim Judaai Na Hoti,
Ae Khuda Tune Yeh Cheez Banayi Na Hoti,
It Na Hum Unse Milte Na Pyar Hoti,
A Zindigi Jo Apni Thi Woh Parayi Na Hoti…

st: Subah Juda Hai Raat Juda Hai,
s:
Subah Juda Hai Raat Juda Hai,
Apni To Her Baat Juda Hai,
Tumse Bichar Ker Aisa Laga,
Jaise Dua Main Haath Juda Hai,
Sab To Aate Rahte Hai,
Tum Aao To Baat Juda Hai…

st: Koi Pakar To Koi Khokar Juda Hota Hai,
s:
Koi Pakar To Koi Khokar Juda Hota Hai,
Koi Hanskar To Koi Rokar Juda Hota Hai,
Magar Juda Hone Ka Dard Tab Hota Hai,
Jab Koi Kisi Ka Hokar Juda Hota Hai…

st: Nigahon Par Nagahon Ke Pher Hoten Hai,
s:
Nigahon Par Nagahon Ke Pher Hoten Hai,
In Nigahone Ke Ghav Bhi Gehare Hoten Hai,
Jane Kyon Kosten Hain Hum Badsurato Ko,
Barbad Karne Wale To Haseen Chehare Hi Hote Hai…

st: Mohabbat Se Reha Hona Zarori Hai,
s:
Mohabbat Se Reha Hona Zarori Hai,
Mera Tujh Se Juda Hona Zarori Hai,
Wafa Ke Tajurbe Karte Hue To Umar Guzri,
Zara Sa Bewafa Hona Zarori Hai,
Meri Aawaz Tanhai Main Marti Ja Rahi Hai,
Kisi Ka Hamnawa Hona Zaarori Hai…

st: Apne Apne Andaz Hoten Hai,
s:
Apne Apne Andaz Hoten Hai,
Jagti Ankhone Mein Bhi Khwab Hoten Hai,
Zaroori Nahi Ki Gum Mein Nikle Aansu,
Muskurahat Ankhone Mein Bhi Sailab Hoten Hai…

st: Dil Se Aapka Khayal Jata Nahi,
s:
Dil Se Aapka Khayal Jata Nahi,
Aapke Siva Koi Yaad Aata Nahi,

Ji Chahta Ki Aapko Roj Dekhu Par,
Wo Waqt Kabhi Aata Nahi…

st: Teri Yaadon Ke Sahare Duniya Mein Rah Lete Hai,
s:
Teri Yaadon Ke Sahare Duniya Mein Rah Lete Hai,
Teri Juddai Ka Gam Chupchap Sah Lete Hai,
Samjhaya Dilko Yeh Raaz Chupana Hai,
Par Aansu Banke Wo Sab Kah Dete Hai…

st: Kehte Hai Gam Baatne Se Hota Hai Kam,
s:
Kehte Hai Gam Baatne Se Hota Hai Kam,
Aisa Hi Kabhi Pele Maante The Hum,

Tere Pyar Ki Nishani Tera Gam Hi To Hai Mere Paas,
Wo Bhi Baatdu To Rahega Kya Mere Paas,

Sochta Hoon In Sagar Ki Lehro Ko Dekh Kar,
Kyon Yeh Kinaro Se Takra Kar Palat Jati Hai,

Karti Hai Vo Kinare Se Bewafai Ya Fir Sagar Se Wafa Nibhati Hai…

st: Waqt Nur Ko Benur Kar Deta Hai,
s:
Waqt Nur Ko Benur Kar Deta Hai,
Thode Se Jakhm Ko Nasur Kar Deta Hai,
Kaun Chahta Hai Aapno Se Door Hona,
Per Waqt Sabko Majboor Kar Deta Hai…

st: Chand Utra Tha Hamare Aangan Mein,
s:
Chand Utra Tha Hamare Aangan Mein,
Ye Sitaro Ko Gwara Na Huaa,
Hum Bhi Sitaro Se Kaise Gila Kare,
Jab Chand Hi Hamara Na Huaa…

st: Nafrat Thi Hamsea To Pyar Kyo Kiya,
s:
Nafrat Thi Hamsea To Pyar Kyo Kiya,
Dena Tha Jahar To Ikrar Kyo Kiya,
De Ke Jahar Ab Kahte Ho Ki Pina Hi Hoga,
Or Jab Pi Gye To Kahte Ho Jina Hi Hoga…

st: Mujhe Kisi Ne Bewafa Ka Naam Diya,
s:
Mujhe Kisi Ne Bewafa Ka Naam Diya,
Sathi Ne Jaise Jahar Ka Jaam Diya,
Jo Kabhi Kaha Karte The Bhula Mat Dena,
Unhone Hi Bhul Jane Ka Paigam Diya…

st: Mere Marne Ke Baad Meri Kahani Likhna,
s:
Mere Marne Ke Baad Meri Kahani Likhna,
Kaise Barbaad Huwi Meri Jawani Likhna,

Aur Likhna Ki Mere Honth Khushi Ko Tarse,
Kaise Barsa Meri Aankhoon Se Paani Likhna,

Aur Likhna Ki Uska Intezaar To Bahut Tha,
Aakhri Saansoon Mein Woh Hichkiyoun Ki Rawaani Likhna,

Likhna Ke Marte Waqt Bhi Deta Tha Dua Tujhko,
Haath Bahar Tha Qafan Se Yehi Nishaani Likhna…

st: Mannato Mein Manga Jise Khuda Sey,
s:
Mannato Mein Manga Jise Khuda Sey,
Kyon Aaj Wo Baddua Ho Gay,

Kal Tak Tha Jo Dard Mera,
Kaise Kisi Ki Dawa Ho Gaya,

Ab Do Sawalo Mein Atki Hai Meri Zindgi,
Ab Ye Khuda Bhi Mujh Sey Khafa Ho Gaya…

st: Gujarte Hai Meri Saanso Me Tera Naam Aaj Bhi,
s:
Gujarte Hai Meri Saanso Me Tera Naam Aaj Bhi,
Dhalti Hai Tere Intezar Me Meri Shaam Aaj Bhi
Tujko Mujh Se Bichde Zamana Ho Gaya,
Magar Hoti Hao Tere Naam Se Meri Pahchan Aaj Bhi…

st: Zindagi Tere Bagair Adhuri Si Lagti Hai,
s:
Zindagi Tere Bagair Adhuri Si Lagti Hai,
Zindagi Jine Ke Liye Teri Jarurat Si Lagti Hai,
Aa Ja Fir Se Laut Kar Meri Zindagi Mein Tu,
Meri Aannkhen Bhi Pyaar Ke Wo Din Dhunda Karti Hai…

st: Shaam Utri Zindagi Gaane Lagi,
s:
Shaam Utri Zindagi Gaane Lagi,
Maut Ko Fir Neend Aane Lagi,
Fir Kisi Ki Yaad Ka Dipak Jala,
Aur Andheri Raat Muskurane Lagi…
